item.title: RSA Asia Pacific and Japan 2019
item.description:
16th July 2019 At the 2019 RSA Asia Pacific and Japan conference we ran a short Velociraptor LAB and also presented a talk. We really enjoyed receiving a lot of positive feedback from the community. View the hands on LAB we presented at RSA This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF.
View our presentation This browser does not support PDFs.

item.title: Crikeycon 2019 Training Workshop
item.description: 24th February 2018 At CrikeyCon 2019 we presented a full day training workshop. It was a lot of fun and we received some great feedback. You can read the slides below. View our presentation This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF.

item.title: New Zealand Internet Task Force Conference 2018
item.description: Nov 2018 We presented a Velociraptor workshop at the NZITF2018 conference. This was a very early presentation and the GUI and capabilities of the tool were limited at the time, although this workshop did demonstrate some of the original design choices. View our presentation This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF.
